name: Sleek Floorlamp RGBW

dps_description.24: colour_data - HSV Color as JSON {h:0-360, s:0-1000, v:0-1000}
dps_description.27: music_data - Music sync data (json, not exposed)

notes: Protocol 3.5 RGBW floor lamp. Color mode white uses brightness only, colour mode uses HSV from DP 24. Scene and music modes available but not fully supported.
